name: Elizabeth: Trust in the Promise
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "A World Without You" is placed on your climax area, if you have another 《Britannia》 character, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Britannia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of that card. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: After all, he promised me!

name: Hawk: Pride of a Hero
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Britannia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Wow, the whole town is lauding Sir Hawk's dazzling medal!

name: Meliodas: Wielder of Lostvayne
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another "Meliodas: Wielder of Lostvayne" in your center stage, this card gets the following 2 abilities. "【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Britannia》 characters." "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room."

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Meliodas: Wielder of Lostvayne", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: Escanor: Arrogant and Powerful
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 "Escanor: Master of the Tavern" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Master of the Sun" is in your climax area, this card's soul is 4 or lower, and you have 4 or more other 《Britannia》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, when this card deals attack damage to your opponent, deal 1 damage X times to your opponent instead. X is equal to this card's soul. (This damage is not damage caused by an 【AUTO】 effect. Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: I told you, didn't I? That your death wouldn't be easy?

name: Escanor: Wielder of Rhitta
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level X or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room. X is equal to the number of "Escanor: Wielder of Rhitta" in your waiting room.
flavor_text: A battle-axe adorned by the sun, bearing a maiden's name. A mere Demon who writhes in the darkness isn't worthy of touching it.

name: Meliodas: Fulfilling His Promise
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

name: Escanor: Master of the Tavern
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Britannia》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Britannia》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Elizabeth: Strong Heart
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Britannia》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 2 《Britannia》 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Britannia》, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if your stock has 4 or less cards, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: My will is a sword that will sever anyone and anything, and a shield to protect my country, my people, my child, and my friends!

name: Slader: Pledging Loyalty
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room.
【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Britannia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Your wish is my command!

name: Vivian: Disguised as Gilfrost
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Britannia》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavor_text: I'll use Teleportation to bring everyone here to a safe place.

name: Grayroad & Fraudrin: Upper Hand
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 0 or lower 《Ten Commandments》 character, put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Grayroad: "All Humans inside the castle have been captured!"

name: Zeldris & Estarossa: In the Heat of Battle
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be returned to hand or put into memory."

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Ten Commandments》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Ten Commandments》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: Zeldris: "Brother!"

name: Zaratras: Heading to the Capital
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Don't tell me they already noticed us?

name: Galland & Melascula: Drinking
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Ten Commandments》 characters.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Galland Game!" from your climax area into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 《Ten Commandments》 characters in your waiting room, put them into your stock in any order, and all of your characters get the following ability until the end of your next stand phase. "【CONT】 If this card's level is higher than your level, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase."
flavor_text:
Galland: "That's good! Who would have thought that alcohol had progressed this far in 3,--- years?"
Melascula: "Yummy! Who would have thought that alcohol had progressed this far in 3,--- years?"

name: Hendrickson: Unfortunate Investigation
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: There's no question, it's the legendary Demon Clan!

name: Flyer Distributors
expansion: The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of The Commandments
ability: If you do not have a 《Ten Commandments》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Choose 1 of the following abilities, and perform it.
"Choose 1 level X or lower 《Ten Commandments》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of "Gloxinia & Drole: Reasons for Switching" in your waiting room."
"[(1)] You may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and move it to another open position of their stage."
flavor_text: Gloxinia: "Okay, you guys. Thanks for passing out those flyers."
